description:
http://anidb.net/ch111715 [Sakura] reveals that she believes her heart is http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana]`s heart. http://anidb.net/ch114695 [Kouhei] confesses that he thinks that too and tells Sakura that Mana is around as a ghost.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Embrace the Courage You`ve Been Given
もらった勇気を抱きしめて
